TADS 3 resources

This is a temporary landing page to aggregate TADS 3 resources in one spot. This site will be built out over time.

Adv3

The default TADS 3 library. Pretty complex, but has a lot of fidelity and powerful features.
    
        test
    
        test
    
        test
    
        test

Adv3Lite

A TADS 3 library by Eric Eve, based off Adv3, but removing a lot of the more niche features of Adv3 and using simpler syntax.
    
        test
    
        test
    
        test
    
        test

TADS 3 system

Pure TADS 3 references, not specific to any library.
